messageBody:
On Wed, 15 Sep 2004 09:15:43 -0500, J. B. Rainsberger <jbrains@...>
wrote:

> love wrote:
>
>> When My tsts fail, The tests Stop.
>> How can I resume tests until Completion
>> even if some Tests fail.Otherwise it stops at the failed test.
>
> As part of the design of JUnit, a test fails right after its first
> assertion fails. See _JUnit Recipes_, recipe 8.5 for details. Get your
> copy at your local online bookstore.


I've got the book, and I highly recommend it. However, for a free and
immediate answer you can read "Why does JUnit only report the first
failure in a single test?" located at
http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#tests_12.


--
